text: Kamaghɨn amizɨma, ia vaghvagh uan arazir kurabar gun Godɨn gumazamizir igharazibav kɨm. Eghtɨ God ian akurvaghsɨ, ia uari bagh God ko mɨkɨmtɨma, eghtɨ God ia damightɨma ia ua deragham. Ezɨ gumazir Godɨn damazimɨn deraghavɨra itim God ko mɨgei, an azangsɨzim bar gavgavir ekiam iti, eghtɨ a igharaz darazir akurvagham.
